about_the_game:
• After receiving a frantic message from her father, Laura heads out to her parents house located inside a cult compound to search for the truth, in this complete remake of the classic horror themed JRPG!

  • Enjoy a high definition hand-drawn art style, from environments, to enemies, to animated events, it's all here and it's uniquely Happy Bones!

  • Explore a cult compound overrun by a demonic force, filled to the brim with secrets, puzzles, and lore.

  • Do battle as one of three different classes, the Brave, the Occult, and the Holy! Each one providing a unique and different style of gameplay.

  • Multiple events play out differently depending on the choices you make! From harder variants of bosses, changing code combinations, to different party members, every single playthrough will feel different than the last.

  • Engage in a dark non-linear story, spanning from the haunted walls of the family compound all the way to infernal hells. Take on events in whatever order you want, or not at all, the choice is yours.
